ABOUT.ME_TEXT:
I'm a frontend and backend Developer from Graz, Austria. Currently I study MultiMediaTechnology (Master) at FH Salzburg.

After some coding sessions I love to drive with my motorbike and take some macro or landscape pictures of the nature. I publish my newest pictures on 500px.
ABOUT.QUOTE: Traveling is the way you learn the most

CODE_TEXT: I love well structured and reusable code, but that just work with a lot of pizza! Human make mistakes therefore I use buildtools to check the quality of the code. Continuous Integration and testing are a big part of my projects.
AUTOMATISATION_TEXT: With Jenkins I enhance my deployment and testing. He does what takes too long if I have to do that everytime. Continuous Integration should be a part of every single person.
INTEREST_TEXT: Learning new stuff is one of the most interesting things for me. New technologies, cooking methods, people or places. Everything has something special where I can learn something new. Personally I like teaching and helping other people - it just makes me everytime happy.

TIMELINE.NAME: Timeline
TIMELINE.ST_POELTEN: I studied Mediatechnologies at the university of applied sciences St.Pölten.
TIMELINE.BERLIN: I made an internship at {{ text }} for 6 months.
TIMELINE.BARCELONA: With a team from across the world we developed a forum for the {{ text }} called Elephorum.
TIMELINE.GRAZ: Summer 2016 I did my internship in Graz at {{ text }}
TIMELINE.SALZBURG: Currently I study MultiMediaTechnology (Master) at FH Salzburg. Web ♥

THANK_YOU: Thank you, I will contact you as soon as possible!
